website_summaries.verdict: While some found this block to be too thick, others felt that it helped with both heat distribution and led to a longer cooking life.
pros: Two inches thick for superior heat distribution and durability
An excellent choice for grilling and searing meats and seafood
cons: Some reports of these arriving cracked or broken
Due to its thickness, may take longer to heat up

customer_reviews.title: Dry aging
customer_reviews.text: Just what I needed. I started to get into dryaging beef/deer meat. This was my first time doing so but it worked out great in my beer fridge. Meat came out tender and took away a lot of the gamey taste my kids think it’s organic beef. Next round is to grill with them.
customer_reviews.author: cheeseball

customer_reviews.title: Perfect condition and a great buy
customer_reviews.text: The salt block came nicely packaged and was in perfect solid condition. My use is a little different as it’s for drawing out negative energy by putting your feet on it and relaxing on a couch for a few minutes. It would also be perfect for grilling/cooking just wasn’t my intended use. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Lesha Carlson

customer_reviews.title: Outside toy
customer_reviews.text: Very nice flavor, easy technique. Smokey if you use the oven—Truly excellent for shrimp and helps to avoid overcooking. I might go for a thinner flatter shape, but this works fine. And post a review or you get email after email!
customer_reviews.author: Mark J. Spearin

customer_reviews.title: age steaks
customer_reviews.text: I have a small refrig which hold a temp 35~37 degree. So, I use the slabs to 45 day age a 4 rib rib eye. looking good, 9/16/18 will be 30 days
customer_reviews.author: CodeRed Golf

customer_reviews.title: Came as advertised
customer_reviews.text: There's definitely a big block of salt here - my microplaner doesn't take it off very well, and the size of the block is too big to use for cooking or to add salt at your dinner plate. That isn't the fault of the salt - I just shouldn't have ordered such a large block. For my purposes, better to simply buy it already ground.
customer_reviews.author: Richard

customer_reviews.title: The corners are brittle and the entire block is deteriorating slowly...
customer_reviews.text: Maybe it's a one-off defect, but at least 4 out of the 8 corners are chipped or breaking. I didn't think it would impact the longevity or performance, but it's gotten worse even after just one use. Doesn't come exactly as advertised...
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: Arrived Broken
customer_reviews.text: But only in two pieces; about one-third broke off one end and is a little small for use, but the other two-thirds piece is whole and, while not as attractive as an unbroken slab, works fine for prep.
customer_reviews.author: Melisa Michaels

customer_reviews.title: Not great
customer_reviews.text: Didn't give as much flavor as we were anticipating. It also started to melt and make indentions throughout the whole stone. Not worth it in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia D. Nevarez

customer_reviews.title: Love this
customer_reviews.text: Love to serve tuna on this salt block! Makes the flavor delicious!
customer_reviews.author: Randy Rice

customer_reviews.title: Love them!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product! Authentic Himalayan salt blocks. Adds tons of flavor and gets a lot of compliments when I use them to serve food on.
customer_reviews.author: Lina

customer_reviews.title: 5 stars
customer_reviews.text: I used it to dry age my steak, over petty good, but a bit pricey
customer_reviews.author: Kenny

customer_reviews.title: ... put these in my horses' feed tubs and its perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I put these in my horses' feed tubs and its perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Wyeventer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome way to cook Wagyu beef!
customer_reviews.text: The Himalayan 2x4x8 was amazing Way to sear Wagyu. The size is perfect for retaining the heat. The salt block is smooth with beautiful salt marbling.
customer_reviews.author: Wiley

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was looking for at a price I couldn’t find better. They work perfectly for my dry ager
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: They work
customer_reviews.text: It worked great. Just needed a bigger one which I've ordered. Steak was very good
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quality not the best
customer_reviews.text: Came to us with what appeared to be a flaw, second time we used it it cracked. While still used able we were disappointed in quality.
customer_reviews.author: joanne banker

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great product.. This was a gift, can't wait to buy my own.
customer_reviews.author: Gloniva

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: product completely broken and smashed in pieces!!!! Want to return!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: dawn lani

customer_reviews.title: Broken
customer_reviews.text: I got it today. Opened it and it was broken. No return policy. I'm very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Floyd

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Mine came in one piece, unlike a few other people here. No complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: They love them. I appreciate the quality and fast shipping
customer_reviews.text: I bought these with the holders for my horses. They love them. I appreciate the quality and fast shipping!
customer_reviews.author: Valerie Wolfe

customer_reviews.title: Can’t wait to cook on it
customer_reviews.text: I like this , I put my sliced tomatoes on it
customer_reviews.author: Brenda Braun

customer_reviews.title: Not a quality block, the size is not correct ...
customer_reviews.text: Not a quality block, the size is not correct 9x9 and 1.5in thick. The size I want to buy it 8x8 and 1in.
customer_reviews.author: Dinh N.

customer_reviews.title: Cracked
customer_reviews.text: This is our second block. We absolutely loved the first one, however, after many, many, many uses it needed to be replaced. We used our new block one time & it cracked in half! It was NOT cracked when we received it, so I don't know what happened this time. Our other one never cracked, that is why we gave it a 3 star. Our first one was a 5 star.
customer_reviews.author: Oma

customer_reviews.title: Add flavor to meat, fish and vegetable, easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: This little salt block works great in my little toaster oven when I don't want to use the oven. I already cooked fish and slices of vegetables. Just use a little of organic basil olive oil on the fish and vegetable and it's almost a non stick surface. Very easy to clean also. Love it. Will definitely buy more!
customer_reviews.author: claire

customer_reviews.title: Crappy product
customer_reviews.text: I received this product 4 days late and the corner was gashed and there were there major cracks in it. I also contacted their customer service and they do not treat me well I sent him pictures of the cracks And they said that it was completely normal. But when I threw it on the grill for the first time it cracked all the way through the whole brick.
customer_reviews.author: Jake

customer_reviews.title: Novel flavors
customer_reviews.text: We utilize the salt block whenever we are bar-b-quing fish. It adds a nice flavor to the fish. We also use it chicken. It is a bit clumsy to handle ... but one learns.
customer_reviews.author: Paul D Ellis

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Nice to put my feet on to help me Stay objective
customer_reviews.author: Lin D. Miller

customer_reviews.title: This salt block is great for snacking!
customer_reviews.text: Sliced apples, tomatoes, and others quick snacks are even tastier after hanging out on the salt block a few minutes. It is also a hit with guests.
customer_reviews.author: kjobuckley

customer_reviews.title: Nice slab, too bad they don’t know how to ...
customer_reviews.text: Nice slab, too bad they don’t know how to package it so that it arrives in ONE PIECE. Disappointment in a box.
customer_reviews.author: CentexHokie

customer_reviews.title: Have to try
customer_reviews.text: Learning how to use this and have cooked with this twice. Really enjoy the flavor added
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It was damaged
customer_reviews.text: My only problem is that it was cracked and it broke if half
customer_reviews.author: Christopher james odom jr

customer_reviews.title: Broken
customer_reviews.text: The salt block was broken in 5 pieces! There was only 1 piece crumpled up brown paper on either side for protection. It’s was a Bday gift😢 I want a new please
customer_reviews.author: Robyn A.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: it was slightly broken. but we made it work. such a neat gift!
customer_reviews.author: Cassandra Holt

customer_reviews.title: Color and style of salt will not be uniform.
customer_reviews.text: ~ very beautiful. It was awesom for creating the environment that I was looking for~
customer_reviews.author: Aksilvercat

customer_reviews.title: Block arrived with a little bit of the corner broken ...
customer_reviews.text: Block arrived with a little bit of the corner broken, but otherwise intact. However, when I tempered the block over a 60 minute period, it cracked.
customer_reviews.author: J. Harney

customer_reviews.title: flavor
customer_reviews.text: I use this salt block for both fish and meats . it gives both an amazing flavor
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Just open it found a big crack in the corner and I can’t return it back.
customer_reviews.author: tam

customer_reviews.title: Yes, it might crack and break off part but the flavor added is superb.
customer_reviews.text: While I took every precaution listed (170 Degrees in the oven, heating in 50 degree increments, cold side of grill, etc.) a triangle portion of about 25% broke off while cleaning it with a brush. Still usable but sad it broke off on my first outing. The flavor added to my flank steak was superb!
customer_reviews.author: OPS

product_meta.title: IndusClassic RSP-17 Himalayan Salt Block, Plate, Slab for Cooking, Grilling, Seasoning, And Serving (8 X 4 X 2
product_meta.description: Size:1 Count (Pack of 1)You can heat IndusClassic RSP-17 crystal salt plate in the oven or on grill & stove from 300 to 400 foreign high and cook on the salt surface light items such as chicken, fish, thinly sliced beef or even an egg. These thick dense blocks surface will be ready for cook with even heat distribution. When you cook on blocks, they precisely transfer a mild and full salt flavor which bring new taste to your food. ---------- Also you can chill salt plates in the refrigerator, and it can be used as a serving tray for fruits, sushi, vegetables, cheese, and desserts with light salt taste. Food which exposed to 84 enriched mineral Himalayan salt will be far tastier than any food on planet. ---------- Salt plate is Easy to clean. You can rinse or wipe with damp paper towel or cloth. It can last for years for enjoyment if you use it carefully. ---------- Indus Classic Himalayan Dark Pink, Light Pink, and White salt was formed from ancient sea salt deposits in the long Range Himalayan Mountain, and it was crystallized with 84 minerals more than 200 million years ago during the formation of our planet. Himalayan Rock Salt is the purest salt to be found on earth because Ancient sea beds were covered by volcanic lava, protecting the salt from pollution.
feature_bullets: 8 X 4 X 2 inch for small size household use
Cook on the salt surface such as chicken, fish, thinly sliced beef or even an egg
Grilling, chilling, searing, and serving on Himalayan Salt blocks
Naturally antimicrobial and easy to clean
Chill in the refrigerator and serve on top fruits, sushi, vegetables, cheese, and desserts
